name: XWUI Accordion Component
description: Accordion component with multiple collapsible sections. Supports single or multiple open modes, custom animations, and bordered/flush styles. Uses XWUICollapse internally for smooth expand/collapse animations.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

mode.description: Accordion mode: single allows only one open item, multiple allows any number

defaultExpanded.description: Array of item IDs that should be expanded initially

bordered.description: Whether to show borders around accordion items

flush.description: Whether to remove outer borders (flush style)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the accordion container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of accordion items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the accordion item

title.description: Title text or HTML element for the accordion item header

content.description: Content text or HTML element for the accordion item body

disabled.description: Whether the accordion item is disabled

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string to display in the item header
